text: The list of shipwrecks in June 1836 includes ships sunk, foundered, wrecked, grounded, or otherwise lost during June 1836. ==1 June== ==2 June== ==3 June== ==4 June== ==5 June== ==6 June== ==7 June== ==8 June== ==11 June== ==13 June== ==14 June== ==16 June== ==19 June== ==20 June== ==22 June== ==24 June== ==25 June== ==27 June== ==28 June== ==29 June== ==30 June== ==Unknown date== ==References== 1836-06
